desc: Bitcoin Twitter/X accounts, influencers, and social media communities to follow.

msgs.text:
Right now, Twitter is a great hub for all things Bitcoin. This summer, I have followed over 2000 people with #bitcoin in their bio. I have found a handful of extremely useful accounts that I will post here. Twitter Spaces (live audio rooms) are wonderful. I've learned so much just from joining those rooms from time to time. Another audio room format is Clubhouse, and they have a forum called "Caf√© Bitcoin." However, Twitter Spaces seems to be the best source of valuable and up to date information on Bitcoin these days.

Twitter accounts to follow: 

Spaces (live audio chatrooms on Twitter) hosts:
https://twitter.com/TheBTCspace (educational Twitter Spaces Wednesdays around 8PM ET)
